commit message:
code refactoring

changed code formatting to more readable
removed a lot of unused imports
removed unused variables
removed unused methods
better error messages from exceptions

fix problem with overlapping textarea

on small screens text area with details about download overlapps cancel button
this commit fixes it

increase required android API version to 18

most methods realted to TelephonyManger require A-API 17 or 18 otherwise an exception is thrown
exception is not visible because whole block of code is in {}catch(Excetpion) block, service wouldn't work and it wouldn't crash

commit increases required API so TelephonyManager will work as supposed.

support automatic key request from OpenCellID

+ added new class - background thread to request opencell id key
+ added new label (see screenshot)
+ touching the label sends the request and sets new key
+ code formatting (sorry, those changes were made automatically by ide)

fix (potential) NPE

can't reproduce but @n76 reported it.

Merge pull request #23 from agilob/refactoring

Support requesting OpenCellID key automatically

Add ability to acquire OpenCellID API key from within backend.

Signed-off-by: Tod Fitch <Tod@FitchDesign.com>
